title: EV Chargers, Crown Molding, Outdoor Putting Green

posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Sand Volleyball Court', '-Stainless Steel or Whirlpool Black Appliances', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool and Spa (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Enjoy Downtown Los Angeles Fine Dining, Shopping, Museums and More!', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Two Print & Copy Rooms', '-Roof Top Pool and Spa with Spectacular City Skyline Views', '-Yoga/Dance Studio w/ Large Flat-Screen TV and DVD Player', '-Four Star Trac/Cybex Cycling Machines', '-Resident Lounge with Full Bar & Kitchen Facilities', '-Three Star Trac/Cybex Elliptical Machines', '-Elegant Ceramic Tile Floors', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
